title: Child and Working Tax Credits statistics: finalised annual awards
description: These statistics relate to Child and Working Tax Credits, and the breakdown of their distribution.
datasetNotes: On the landing page scroll to national statistics and click on the latest  version link for Child and Working Tax Credits statistics: finalised annual awards this will open another window the data can be found under documents
sizingNotes: Different table structure with footnotes. also available as a Zip file containing CSV and Meta data
notes: There is also an entry under towns and high strees at LSOA level for Child and Working Tax Credits.
